meanings.definition: Paintings or drawings done as a base layer before adding detail.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully created the underpaintings to establish the foundation of the artwork.
meanings.sent2: Restorers discovered hidden underpaintings beneath the surface of the old masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The underpaintings were so faint, they looked like ghostly sketches on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: Her underpaintings were like whispers of color waiting to be brought to life.
meanings.sent5: The underpaintings revealed the artist's meticulous planning and technique.

meanings.definition: The initial layer of paint applied to a canvas before adding additional layers.
meanings.sent1: Before starting the detailed work, the artist always applied the underpaintings first.
meanings.sent2: The underpaintings provided a solid base for the rest of the painting to come alive.
meanings.sent3: The underpaintings seemed to dance beneath the final layers of paint.
meanings.sent4: The underpaintings were like a secret garden waiting to bloom on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The underpaintings added depth and richness to the final masterpiece.
